SnapshotOraclev11g.name: All_Dropped_Count_MV
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery: SELECT to_char(Modification_Date, 'YYYY') AS Year, to_char(Modification_Date, 'MM') AS Month, to_char(Modification_Date, 'DD') AS Day, COUNT(*) AS Count FROM ARCHIVED_TICKET WHERE UPPER(TICKET_STATUS) = "DROPPED" GROUP BY ROLLUP to_char(Modification_Date, 'YYYY'), to_char(Modification_Date, 'MM'),to_char(Modification_Date, 'DD')
